column1: helen lorraine ryan| helen lorraine ryan
column5: 2015 at the lorien nursing home in mt. airey. born january 19
column7: she was the daughter of the late gittings merryman baublitz and katie bayne baublitz. she was the beloved wife of thomas e. ryan
column8: sr. she was an executive secretary for the vfw at the war memorial building in baltimore
column9: and a homemaker. in addition to her husband
column10: she is survived by her sons: thomas e. and brian t. ryan
column11: 4 grandchildren and 4 great grandchildren friends may call on tuesday from 3-5 and 7-9 pm at the eckhardt funeral chapel
column12: p. a. 11605 reisterstown rd. owings mills
column13: where services will be held on wednesday at 11:00 am interment in garrison forest veterans cemetery at a later date. online condolences may be offered at www. eckhardtfuneralchapel. com
